tool_description: Updates and manages WHOIS contact information for domains, handles privacy settings, and ensures compliance with registrar requirements.

domain_name.description: Domain name to update WHOIS information for

contact_type.description: Type of contact to update (registrant, admin, technical, billing)

contact_name.description: Full name of the contact person

update_all_contacts.description: Apply changes to all contact types

error_messages: Invalid contact type: Use registrant, admin, technical, or billing.
Invalid email format: Contact email must be a valid email address.
Invalid phone format: Phone number must include country code and proper formatting.
Domain locked: Domain is locked for transfers and WHOIS updates are restricted.
Verification required: Email verification needed before WHOIS changes take effect.
Registrar restriction: Current registrar does not allow WHOIS updates through API.
Missing required fields: All contact information fields are mandatory.
usage: Specify domain name, contact type, and complete contact information. Optionally update all contact types at once and configure privacy protection settings.

update_status.description: Status of WHOIS update (success, pending_verification, failed)

effective_date.description: When changes will become effective in ISO format
